name: Monster Girls Gaynerations: Ghoulfriends For Life
name_original: Monster Girls Gaynerations: Ghoulfriends For Life
description:
Cursed to be a ghost forever, your only hope to break the spell is the four monster girls who volunteered to help you. Choose between a werewolf, a witch, a slime girl, and a medusa. Make the right choices and perhaps you'll find true love along the way. 

This is a game we made in two weeks for an assignment.

*A repost to our dev itch page. Originally found on thefantasticjen.itch.io*

-

Lovingly made by ✨Spooklight Games✨

Keana Almario - character concept art, character lineart, script editing, implementation
Yani Wang - character colour, backgrounds
Jennifer Stienstra - script, implementation
Shepherd Cameron - script, implmentation
Jesse Toyota - music, sfx
